creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
inscription: left: 自摺　昭和三年作　東京拾二題　不忍池 {Jizuri, Shōwa sannen saku, Tōkyō jūnidai, Shinobazu no ike}
markings: LRC, red artist's seal A: 博 {Hiroshi} | bottom left, red collector seal: 末久壽宇恵留 {Matsuhisa Juu Eru}
medium: Woodblock print, ink and color on paper
portfolio: Twelve Scenes of Tokyo (Tōkyō jūnidai 東京拾二題)
provenance:
末久壽宇恵留 {Matsuhisa Juu Eru}

title: Shinobazu Pond
